"SGTF" means S Gene Target Failure. S is SARS-CoV-2's spike gene. When you have a ton of mutations in a gene, then sequencing can fail. And Omicron's S gene has a ton of mutations. Now many labs are finding Omicron+ samples by going back and resequencing samples with SGTF.
